message.content:
cs.DL, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.SD 

The paper deals with predicting hot topics in the field of Computer Science using a dataset from Microsoft Academic Graph. The features used for prediction include citation relations, authors' h-index, and growth rates of topics. This suggests that the paper could belong to several sub-categories such as Data Mining (cs.DL), Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Social and Information Networks (cs.SI), Machine Learning (cs.LG), and Software Engineering (cs.SD). However, given the focus on predicting trends and growth rates, Data Mining (cs.DL) and Information Retrieval (cs.IR) seem to be the most likely sub-categories.
